headline: Gartner (IT) Posts Q2 2025 Financial Results
summary: Gartner, Inc. (NYSE:IT) is one of the Reddit Stocks with the Highest Upside Potential. On August 5, the company posted Q2 2025 financial results, with revenue, adjusted EBITDA, adjusted EPS, and FCF ahead of expectations. Gartner, Inc. (NYSE:IT) noted that the challenging Q1 2025 selling environment, which was impacted by DOGE and tariff-affected industry spending changes, continued […]

headline: Gartner, Inc. (IT): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on Gartner, Inc. on Value investing subreddit by tomlerr. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on IT.
